parameters.name: P0

parameters.name: P1
parameters.description: Array of 3 doubles (x,y,z); nearest point on circle

parameters.name: TextPoint
parameters.description: Array of 3 doubles (x,y,z); position of text

remarks: SOLIDWORKS creates this type of dimension between the two points you specify. It has no relation to your geometry.
